data.eml:eml: Key to the world species of Holoparasitus Oudemans, 1936 (Acari: Parasitiformes: Parasitidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Witaliński, Wojciech (2017): Key to the world species of Holoparasitus Oudemans, 1936 (Acari: Parasitiformes: Parasitidae). Zootaxa 4277 (3): 301-351, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4277.3.1
